main.name: Bart Cusick
main.description: A Full-Stack Web Developer and Designer with a great imagination. A humorous and open-minded personality has always made it easy to communicate and work with others. Eager to learn, extremely adaptable, and quick to pick up new tasks. Always met customer deadlines. Innovative, imaginative, multimedia oriented and can draw really cool monsters.
main.bio: A Full-Stack Web Developer and Designer with a great imagination. A humorous and open-minded personality has always made it easy to communicate and work with others. Eager to learn, extremely adaptable, and quick to pick up new tasks. Always met customer deadlines. Innovative, imaginative, multimedia oriented and can draw really cool monsters.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
education.description: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill's Full-Stack Coding Boot Camp provides the ability and knowledge to build dynamic end-to-end web applications. Skills Gained include Design Patterns, Algorithms, HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, jQuery, Responsive Design, Bootstrap, Handlebars, Local Storage,Express.js, MVC, React.js, Heroku, Git, MySQL, MySQL Workbench, MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Security and Session Storage, User Authentication, MERN Stack, QA, SEO, Semantic HTML, Progressive Web Apps, Web Accessibility.

education.degree: Art and Design / Humanities and Social Science

work.title: Web Content Developer / Flash Developer II
work.description: Create interactive e-learning courses for adult literacy. Create illustration, Web Design, 3d design, Game design, and graphic design for www.gcfleanfree.org. Create corporate identity and branding materials.

work.title: Flash Developer
work.description: Create Graphics and Interactive Flash files for custom E-Learning courses. Clients Included E-labcorp, GSK, Intel, and Schneider Electric.

projects.title: OutDoor Adventure Planner
projects.category: Full stack Website for planning your next bike trip.

projects.title: LookinRuff
projects.category: Full Stack website. Log-in and create apointments for a Pet Grooming Salon.

projects.title: Coding Quiz Challenge
projects.category: A timed Code Quiz with multiple-choice questions. This app will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by your JavaScript code.
